phrases: Maihou Newspaper Corporation 60th Anniversary Piano Competition.
She got all of that one!
You do not have to hit the snot out of it!
So she struck yet again, huh?
I better make a run for it...
Thank goodness it is not someone else!
All I can see is red!
We just got this window fixed, you know!
A slugger is only as good as the number of windows she is broken.
You are blasting them too hard!
No way am I batting with any less than my A-swing!
It is my last summer in middle school, okay?
I am going to win the Triple Crown!
Anyway, got to get this cleaned up.
So I am going to have to apologize again?
And write up the damage report...
What if you sliced a finger?
you seek each other out whenever, wherever...
Right, you loving hubby and wife?
We are not hubby and wife!
Anyway, what are you doing with that cell phone?
Are not you in the middle of practice, Soccer Team?
Do not come in here with your shoes on, Watari!
Telling us off for an hour over a little broken glass?
Well, at least it only lasted an hour, right?
I was stuck with her for that hour.
In the first place, the school should not be standing right in the ball's path.
Since the girls cheer me on from the windows sometimes.
So now it is food over sex, huh?
I am going to stop by the convenience store.
I mean, how messed up is that?
Why should I have to get yelled at, too?
I am going to stock up!
Damn, Kousei, talk about collateral damage.
Not only did you get yelled at, but you have to write two letters of apology?
Oh, it is no big deal.
I have been babysitting her since birth, so it is second nature to me now.
Busting a suspension bridge during a field trip...
Dumping me off a 10-meter diving board...
Was that back in third grade?
I thought I was going to die.
Even though I am an only child, it is like having a high-maintenance big sister.
You really are a nice guy, huh, Kousei?
But Kousei, you would better not be too nice.
You know what they say... nice guys are doomed to finish last.
I got a text from Keiko-chan!
I have somewhere to be, guys!
Who knows what they all see in him?
But Watari's a good guy, you know.
He is the enemy of all women!
Is not there anyone you have a crush on?
Miwa said something the other day.
That when you are in love with somebody, everything looks colorful...
There is no one who would ever fall in love with me.
There is no sparkle in your eyes!
They do not sparkle because they are dark brown, obviously.
You get my drift, do not you?
You are an adolescent, so they should be all lit up!
Your eyes are lit up, Tsubaki.
In Tsubaki's eyes, I will bet everything around her looks colorful.
When is your father coming home?
Mmm...in a month, or maybe two...
So you do not know yet.
Well, since it changes depending on the client's needs.
If anything happens, your family will help out.
And besides, I am used to being on my own now.
I was going to ask him today, but I forgot!
Okay, I will do it for sure tomorrow.
Miwa said something the other day.
Everything I saw, everything I heard...
All the scenery around me started to take on color.
To me it all looks like it is in monotone.
The autumn I was eleven... I...
Could no longer play the piano.
What does youth mean to you, anyway?
We will never have our fourteenth spring again, you know!
Sitting alone in the classroom after school...
Hey, do not yank on those!
Hey, is this The Millions' new song?
The one that is playing on that commercial now?
Kousei, tomorrow's Saturday, so you are free, right?
Do not just jump to conclusions!
Oh, so you have plans, then?
See, this girl in my class asked me to introduce her to Watari.
And we are going to meet up tomorrow.
Well, if it is just me, this girl, and Watari, it is going to be awkward for me.
Because you know it is going to get romantic as heck.
But two on two would be perfect.
I hear this girl plays classical music.
Since you play piano, Kousei, you would have something to talk about,
which would be a big help, see?
Whenever the conversation lags, you could talk about instruments and stuff, right?
I have not played in two years.
You were playing yesterday in the music room!
I am transcribing the new songs by ear.
If you can do that in the classroom, you would not have to play the piano.
I was just checking the sound.
There are tons of other part-time jobs out there, you know.
It looks like you are desperately clinging onto it.
You were way cooler when you played the piano, Kousei.
To raise me to become a world-class pianist.
My mother ran a music school, and I took lessons from her
day after day, for hours on end...
She would hit me... yell at me...
She would not let me off even if I cried.
You are going to make it big in Europe, in my place.
If it will make you happy, Mother...
If it will make you get well...
Then I will keep at it.
Just when I finally had a European competition in my sights, three years ago...
But if I am still clinging to it,
it must be because I have nothing else.
Take away the piano, and I am empty...
There is nothing left but an ugly resonance.
They should have been here five minutes early.
They are the ones who asked me to come...
Miwa said something the other day.
The moment I met him, my life changed.
Everything I saw, everything I heard...
All the scenery around me started to take on color.
The whole world began to sparkle.
I blew on it too hard...
It is got to be a bugle, or it will not work.
Well, but it is a melodica.
Borders, race, ecology... none of them mean anything in music.
Let us all try it together!
What a great picture they make...
They are the Bremen Town Musicians!
It is the first spring storm!
You have ruined my chances for marriage!
But this was just a miraculous coincidence...
D-Do not use instruments as weapons!
You will not get away with this!
What part of coincidence do not you get?
You are so full of it!
Hey, I do not see them.
You think they are waiting in the wrong spot?
Listen, Tsubaki, is this girl really that cute?
Girls calling other girls cute... not exactly credible, you know.
Uh, let us take it from the top.
He may not look it, but he is the captain of the soccer team.
Can you believe that instant about-face?
I am ashamed of myself for being transfixed.
Oh, and not that it really matters,
One word out of you, and you are dead, Camera Voyeur!
Beating him to the punch by approaching her first...
My, my, are not you the player?
I am telling you, it was a miraculous coincidence!
What are you so pissed about?
But you are out of luck!
Today, you are in a supporting role.
You are just Friend A, serving as Watari's foil.
Who would want a vicious girl like...
I am going to be up soon!
I have got to head over right now!
I will be performing there today.
The spring of my fourteenth year...
I am taking off with you.
